function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inter-species disease transmission and risk within Cantanhez National Park","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases between different species within the national park","Mitigation":"Implementation of measures to reduce inter-species disease transmission and risk, such as training and awareness programs for rangers and staff","Technologies":"Remote monitoring and communication technologies for early detection and response","People":"Rangers, staff, and wildlife within Cantanhez National Park","Owner":"National park management and conservation organizations"},{"Description":"Impact of cancelled field trips, meetings, and networking opportunities on conservation biases","Impact":"Potential entrenchment of existing biases within conservation due to limited networking and skill-based opportunities","Mitigation":"Developing alternative virtual platforms for networking, providing online training and skill development opportunities, and addressing biases through targeted interventions","Technologies":"Virtual meeting platforms and online training tools","People":"Conservation researchers, practitioners, and stakeholders","Owner":"Conservation organizations and research institutions"},{"Description":"Loss of in-person engagement mechanisms leading to decline in community trust and participation","Impact":"Potential decline in trust within remote communities and reduced participation in conservation activities due to restricted in-person engagement","Mitigation":"Utilizing technology to maintain community engagement, implementing virtual education and collaboration programs, and addressing community concerns through transparent communication and support","Technologies":"Communication technologies, virtual education platforms, and citizen science programs","People":"Local communities, conservation staff, and visitors","Owner":"Conservation organizations and local community stakeholders"}]}
